name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-open-ai-search-file-upload-nodejs
title: Teams Open AI Embeddings And Redis Search based On Uploaded File Using Bot
shortDescription: This Open AI sample app demonstrates the user search functionality using Open AI embeddings and completion APIs.
longDescription: This Open AI sample app demonstrates the user search functionality based on Open AI embeddings and completion APIs for user queries, and it is based on files uploaded by an admin using a bot.

metadata.value: bot, messaging, file-upload, open-ai, redis search
